unnormalised: Electoral reforms are vital for strengthening Indian democracy. We must consider proportional representation alongside the current First-Past-The-Post system. Addressing concerns of booth capturing, especially in states like Bihar, is paramount. The Election Commission of India needs enhanced autonomy. Campaign finance regulations must be more transparent; unaccounted Rs. could sway voters. Voter ID card issuance should be universal. Consider online voting for NRIs. Reforming delimitation based on the latest census (2021) is crucial. The 2000 sq ft area surrounding polling booths should be sanitized. Dr. Sharma's committee recommendations merit further attention.
